parameters.query: INSERT INTO multilingual_content (product_id, content_id, batch_id, language_code, translated_script, audio_url, audio_duration, channel_id, status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9) ON CONFLICT (content_id, language_code) DO UPDATE SET translated_script = EXCLUDED.translated_script, audio_url = EXCLUDED.audio_url, audio_duration = EXCLUDED.audio_duration, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id
